document_data.name: Silverscales Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverscales Street''' was a cobbled lakeside street in [[Suzail]]. It stretched from [[The Basin]], the city's commercial deepwater harbor, to the edge of [[Bolliver's Wharf]].{{cite web| url = http://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Dec 2004 | accessdate = 13-04-2021| date = 13-04-2021}}
